nodes.text: Heir to the Empire: The 20th Anniversary Edition

Heir to the Empire: The 20th Anniversary Edition is a reissue of the 1991 Star Wars Legends novel Heir to the Empire by Timothy Zahn. This special twentieth-anniversary edition includes a new introduction by Zahn, a new foreword by Lucasfilm's Howard Roffman, annotations by Zahn and editor Betsy Mitchell, and an all-new novella by Zahn, Crisis of Faith, featuring Grand Admiral Thrawn. It was published by Del Rey on September 6, 2011.
Heir to the Empire: The 20th Anniversary Edition was originally scheduled for a June 21, 2011 release.
